name: Dictionary in the City
description:
This is a game where you are a person of the USA and you are in Brazil. You have to take the dicionaries (6) to win the game. 

Controls:   

   W

       A       S         D

Click " Space" to fly.

Game make by: Murilo Lima Lemos de Melo, Orienter: Richard. Made in Brazil. Curso de Programação em Games 2D, Avançado. Happy Araçatuba.

A special thanks to Joth who makes the music.
